title: My account been hacked
body: How do I recover my account after it has been hacked? Can I even recover my account at all? I been trying to get my account for the past three weeks. What else can I do?

replies.body: I can't because I cannot sign back into my account because the hacker locked me out. What other ways can I do it? I had filled out two forms of information of my account but haven't gotten any feedback in the past 4 weeks.

You'll need to reach out to our account recovery agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and verify yourself. After that, you'll be able to update your account security details and repair any damage that might have been done in the process.
Report it as hacked through a support ticket or something?
